pages.text: $(thing)Breezevine Essence$() is an advanced form of air magic extracted from the Breezevine Flower. This essence manifests as a swirling, constantly moving substance that appears to be perpetually in motion, even when contained.$(br2)Unlike basic Gust Essence, Breezevine Essence creates sustained, controlled air currents rather than brief gusts.

This essence can be extracted from Breezevine Flower blooms through careful magical processing.$(br2)The resulting magical material maintains its potency indefinitely if properly stored, though exposure to extreme heat may cause it to dissipate prematurely.

pages.title: Essence Creation
pages.text: Breezevine Essence is created through specialized processes that combine magical components in precise proportions. The resulting essence retains the sustained air movement properties of the Breezevine plant.

pages.title: Magical Properties
pages.text: $(li)Creates persistent air currents$(li)When cast directly, propels you backwards with a powerful gust$(li)Grants brief fall protection during use$(li)Enhances mobility and levitation effects$(li)Sustains wind-based spells for extended durations$(br2)Mana Cost: [value]$(br)Single-use when cast directly

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: $(li)Direct casting for mobility and escape$(li)Grafting onto a Living Staff$(li)Creating propulsion devices$(li)Component in directional air-based magical items$(li)Crafting items that provide fall protection$(br2)$(italic)Caution: When working with Breezevine Essence, secure loose objects in your workspace, as the constant air currents can displace lightweight items.$()
